sm.description: X-Small Buttons, Pills, Checkboxes, Radio Buttons

md.description: Small Buttons, Segmented Control, Tooltip, Avatar

lg.description: Default height for most components, like Medium Buttons, Segmented Control, Banner, Input Fields, and Menu List Items

xl.description: Large size used in Large Buttons, Segmented Controls, Expandable Container Trigger, Tabs, and Avatar
